messages.content: How do I set up a web interface using ComfyUI?

Clone or download the comfygen repository into the `custom_nodes` directory within ComfyUI. Then run the ComfyUI server by executing `run_nvidia_gpu.bat` or `run_cpu.bat`. Enable Dev Mode Options, generate a workflow JSON, replace the base workflow JSON with your own, and access the web interface at `<comfy_address>:<comfy_port>/<repository_name>`.
What files should I replace to use my custom workflow in ComfyUI?
Replace the `web/js/base_workflow.json` file with your generated JSON workflow file to use your customized workflow in ComfyUI.
How do I enable Dev Mode Options in ComfyUI?
Click on 'Settings' in the ComfyUI interface to enable Dev Mode Options.
What is the default workflow replacement process in ComfyUI?
In Dev Mode, click 'Save (API Format)' to create a JSON for your workflow. Then replace the `web/js/base_workflow.json` file with your JSON to use your workflow.
How do I access the web interface for ComfyUI?
Open your web browser and navigate to `http://<comfy_address>:<comfy_port>/<repository_name>` (for example, `http://127.0.0.1:8188/comfygen`) to access the ComfyUI web interface.
